name: Advanced Pirates & Monsters
description:
Advanced Pirates & Monsters is an action 2D game for Android devices. Compared to the browser version, mobile APM is greatly extended, featuring:
- player ship's upgrades, activated with points gathered
- additional playable content
- 3 Google Play leaderboards
- 13 Google Play achievements to unlock
- many visual adjustments

Advanced Pirates & Monsters was qualified to be presented at the Indie Showcase during Digital Dragons 2016 conference in Krakow.
